titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

Oct 27 Memoires of a Fox Hunting Man Jan 11. Dec. 16. Sent bill to B.I. and p.c. for book to Mr Cooke. 157.70 Jan 11. Fountain. sent p.c. Feb 6. Feb. 22. Renewed - Feb. 22. Trumpet Major. Feb 27 27.
